headline: AIG Stock Sinks on CEO’s Surprise Plan to Step Down
summary: Peter Zaffino  is stepping down as chief executive of American International Group after a turbulent period at the insurer that culminated in  AIG  insisting it wasn’t for sale.  In November, AIG abruptly scrapped plans to bring in another executive,  John Neal,  as Zaffino’s heir apparent.  The reversal, two weeks before Neal was due to start, was triggered by AIG’s discovery that Neal’s previous employer was investigating an alleged workplace affair.

The reversal, two weeks before Neal was due to start, was triggered by AIG’s discovery that Neal’s previous employer was investigating an alleged workplace affair.

headline: Stocks to Watch Tuesday: AIG, Vistra, Microchip, Under Armour
summary: ↗️ Vistra (VST): The power-generation company plans to buy Cogentrix Energy in a roughly $4 billion deal that will include natural-gas generation facilities. Shares rallied as much as 5% Tuesday morning.

headline: AIG CEO to step down in June, Ford posts strong Q4 sales
summary: Market Catalysts host Julie Hyman and Yahoo Finance markets and data editor Jared Blikre track several of the day's top trending stock tickers, including American International Group (AIG) CEO Peter Zaffino announcing his plans to step down this June, Microchip Technology's (MCHP) preliminary earnings results pointing to a recovery in sales, and Ford (F) reporting strong fourth quarter sales figures. To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Market Catalysts.

headline: AIG’s CEO Is  Stepping Down. The Insurance Stock Is Falling.
summary: Peter Zaffino is retiring as CEO of  American International Group  with longtime  Aon  executive Eric Andersen taking the reins at the property and casualty insurer.  AIG said Zaffino, who has led the company since 2021, will transition to executive chair and leave his post as chief executive by mid-year.

summary: American International Group’s chairman and chief executive, Peter Zaffino, plans to retire as chief executive midyear and will hand the reins to longtime Aon executive Eric Andersen.

headline: Almonty Appoints Veteran Financial Executive Guillaume Wiesenbach de Lamaziere, CFA as Chief Development Officer
summary: TORONTO, January 06, 2026--Almonty Industries Inc. ("Almonty" or the "Company") (NASDAQ: ALM) (TSX: AII) (ASX: AII) (Frankfurt: ALI1), a leading global producer of tungsten, today announced the appointment of Guillaume Wiesenbach de Lamaziere, CFA as Chief Development Officer to spearhead key corporate development strategy and execution.

headline: Peter Zaffino to Transition to Executive Chair of AIG’s Board of Directors by Mid-2026
summary: NEW YORK, January 06, 2026--American International Group, Inc. (NYSE: AIG) today announced that Chairman & CEO Peter Zaffino has informed the AIG Board of Directors that he intends to transition to Executive Chair of AIG and retire as CEO by mid-year after successfully leading the company’s transformation and strategic repositioning as a leading global property and casualty insurer.

raw.headline: Peter Zaffino to Transition to Executive Chair of AIG’s Board of Directors by Mid-2026
